Type.Name: CallbackMarshal

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CallbackMarshal(Object objekt, IntPtr data, uint n_args, Arg args);
.class public auto ansi sealed CallbackMarshal extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Delegate for specifying a function signature for marshalling callbacks.
